The Romano Law Firm

Custom Website Design & Development

With a website that had not been touched in over a decade, The Romano Law Firm needed an upgrade. JordanCox.dev stepped in to help, completely redesigning theromanolawfirm.com to adhere to modern web standards by implementing a mobile-first responsive design, SEO best practices, and ensuring accessibility for screen readers. JordanCox.dev proposed a plan for the new site, designed and developed a new site based on that plan, and deployed the website in less than a week.
